casebody.data:
JOHN MAYO, PLAINTIFF-APPELLANT, v. CITY NATIONAL BANK AND TRUST COMPANY, DEFENDANT-RESPONDENT. Superior Court of New Jersey Appellate Division Argued September 15, 1969 Decided September 22, 1969.

Before Judges Goldmann, Lewis and Matthews.

Mr. Kent A. Losche argued the cause for appellant (Messrs. Losche & Losche, attorneys). Mr. David B. Rudd argued the cause for respondent (Messers. Raff and Scheider, attorneys). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed substantially for the reasons expressed in Judge Lora’s reported opinion, 103 N. J. Super. 227.
